channel.title: The Big Red Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Weekly Pop Culture Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Alyssa
channel.itunes:summary: Weekly pop culture discussion from the mind behind The Big Red Blog. Each week we analyze popular culture and offer up reviews of the best and worst on the big and small screens. Or pages. Or disc. We like to mix it up.

item.title: BRP 258: Drool Bucket Edition edition
item.itunes:author: Alyssa, Deeps and Derek
item.itunes:subtitle: Thinking Critically About Pop Culture
item.itunes:summary:
Hello! We had to wait a week to get enough to talk about, but I think we'll be cool for the rest of the summer. This week we cover: Men at Work, Longmire, Revenge, Teen Wolf, Veep, Girls, Cougar Town, Awake and the Scripps Spelling Bee. Yes, someone has an opinion about it.
We're back together all summer!
We have a NEW phone number: 617-858-0733. We also have a NEW email address, because something dumb happened! You can now email us: thebigredpodcast@gmail.com. Sorry for the problems if you've tried to email in the past.
Find us on Twitter: @bigredpodcast
Visit us at www.bigredpodcast.com or email us: thebigredpodcast@gmail.com
Musical score provided by Ernesto Burden, www.ernestoburden.com.

item.title: BRP: Her name is Veronica
item.itunes:author: Alyssa Boehm
item.itunes:subtitle: A round table discussion about the wonders of neo-noir in CW's Veronica Mars.
item.itunes:summary:
This week Alyssa is joined by Derek, Salena and Erin to discuss the world of noir in southern California on Veronica Mars. We talk about who killed Dean O'Dell, what we love about the show, and what we think about the big mysteries that the show tackles each week. Plus we giggle, incessantly - that's probably annoying. We talk at length about mysteries from seasons 1, 2, and 3 so be warned!
